mapper.select: SELECT a.picid, a.otherid, a.similarity, p.src_thumbnail as "pic.srcThumbnail", p.src as "pic.src", o.src_thumbnail as "other.srcThumbnail", o.src as "other.src" FROM ( SELECT picid, otherid, similarity FROM timeline_similar GROUP BY picid, otherid, similarity ORDER BY picid, similarity DESC ) a LEFT JOIN timeline_pic p on p.short_ID = a.picid LEFT JOIN timeline_pic o on o.short_ID = a.otherid
